message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit too steep for me. How about this split instead? It accounts for the time value of money.
Considering inflation, I'm being generous with this 58-42 split. Take it before the money loses more value!
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer gives us both a decent share considering the inflation we're facing. Let's close the deal.
